text:
An exception occures when executing templatesign.exe with -wh option. The code 
should never get to the HMAC code before throwing an exception.  We should see 
the mis-match between keys and algorithms. Templatesign.exe should catch the 
exception, print the error message and exit cleanly.
creator: milan@setcce.org

text:
Milan,

Have just put two fixed into CVS for this.

Firstly - templatesign now properly catches Crypto exception, reports and exits.

Secondly - the hash code now checks that the key passed in actually is an HMAC 
key.  If not - it throws an XSECException.

Thanks!

Cheers,
    Berin
creator: berin@ozemail.com.au
